shared.definitions

Class ResourceHand

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.definitions.ResourceHand

  • public class ResourceHand
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a collection of resources cards. It has five properties: [Brick, Wood, Sheep, Wheat, Ore]. Each has an integer value. 0 means the card amount doesn’t change. A negative number means you’re gaining a card. Positive means you’re giving a way a card.
